data.title: Coffee Break: I want candy
data.meta_description: November 4 is National Candy Day - a day to pick through the remainder of your Halloween leftovers and feel zero guilt about celebrating sweets and treats. So for today's Coffee Break, what songs that mention candy or types of candy do you want to hear?
data.text:
November 4 is National Candy Day - a day to pick through the remainder of your Halloween leftovers and feel zero guilt about celebrating sweets and treats.

So for today's Coffee Break, what songs that mention candy or types of candy do you want to hear?

We celebrated International Chocolate Day in September, so try to avoid these songs if you can:

Cigarettes and Chocolate Milk - Rufus Wainwright

Savoy Truffle - The Beatles

Chocolate Jesus - Tom Waits

More Songs About Chocolate and Girls - The Undertones

Chocolate and Strawberries - The Januaries

Chocolate On My Tongue - The Wood Brothers

Chocolate Rain - Tay Zonday

Chocolate City - Parliament

Songs played
